metadata.notes: Create folders /backend, /frontend, /workspace, /plans. Initialize tasks.json, README.md, .gitignore. Add package managers etc.
Define FastAPI routes for sessions and messages, integrate task queue persistence, council endpoints, tool actions, worker logic.
Wire ChatGPT Agent Mode to backend, call Claude planner, implement file operations and commands, diff summarization and verification.
Create left sidebar, chat panel, right panel with plan/log view; implement file explorer and diff viewer; ensure mobile responsiveness and dark/light mode.
Implement continuous scheduled runs, task resume logic, checkpoints, health checks, and safe loop execution.
